biotools.summary: Length-Aware Site Alignment Guided by Nucleotide Association algorithm for Transcription Factor Binding Site alignment. Search include (i) acceptance of unaligned variable-length TFBSs, (ii) a collection of 1726 TF models, (iii) automatic promoter sequence retrieval, (iv) visualization in the UCSC Genome Browser, and (v) gene regulatory network inference and visualization based on binding specificities.

bioschemas.name: LASAGNA-Search
